Interface SMSDataModelInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SMSDataModelArray, SMSDataModelList

    public interface SMSDataModelInterface
    This interface defines a model that maintains a list of phoneNumbers and one message. It allows phone numbers to be added but only if not already in the list. The maximum number of phone numbers allowed can be set when the SMSDateModel object is created. If none is set then there is no maximum.

    • Method Detail

      • addPhoneNumber

        java.lang.String addPhoneNumber(java.lang.String newPhoneNumber)
                         throws SMSDataModelFullException
        Adds a new phone number.
        Parameters:
        newPhoneNumber - - the number to be added
        Returns:
        "DUPLICATE" if the number is already in the list otherwise returns the number that was added
        Throws:
        SMSDataModelFullException

      • findPhoneNumberIndex

        int findPhoneNumberIndex(java.lang.String targetNumber)
        Finds the position in the array of the target phone number
        Parameters:
        targetNumber - the target phone number
        Returns:
        returns the index of the number in the array if found otherwise returns -1

      • updatePhoneNumber

        java.lang.String updatePhoneNumber(java.lang.String newPhoneNumber,
                                   int i)
        Updates a phone number at a particular position in the list
        Parameters:
        newPhoneNumber - - the number to be use
        i - - the position to update
        Returns:
        null if the number cannot be updated because the index i is out of range "DUPLICATE" if the number being provided, newPhoneNumber, is actually already in the model otherwise returns the number just replaced

      • getPhoneNumber

        java.lang.String getPhoneNumber(int i)
        Get a phone number at a particular position in the list
        Parameters:
        i - - the position to retrieve
        Returns:
        null if the number cannot be retrieved because the index i is out of range otherwise returns the number at position i

      • deleteNumber

        java.lang.String deleteNumber(int i)
        Deletes a phone number at a particular position in the list
        Parameters:
        i - - the position to delete
        Returns:
        null if the number cannot be deleted because the index i is out of range otherwise returns the number that is deleted

      • getMaxNumPhoneNumbers

        int getMaxNumPhoneNumbers()
        Returns:
        the max number of phone numbers that this model can hold, -1 if there is no Maximum

      • isFull

        boolean isFull()
        Returns:
        true if the Model has reached the maximum number of phone numbers it can hold, false otherwise

      • getPhoneNumbers

        java.lang.String[] getPhoneNumbers()
        Returns:
        an Array of the phone numbers in the model.

      • getNumPhoneNumbers

        int getNumPhoneNumbers()
        Returns:
        the number of phone numbers in the model

        Parameters:
